item.description: BINGO AT IT'S BEST...link http://www.foxwoods.com/bingo.aspx...I suggest you buy your tickets online now...tickets are 25 dollars each.....prize money for bingo games are over 1000 dollars for each game. WOW.....strict 8 people limit....we will car-pool if you wish doors open at 8....I will leave at 7 am...if you want to sit together in the non-smoking area, this is strongly recommended...I will try to be thetre when doors open....you may bring anything you want in,for breakfast there.....please let me know when you RSVP yes,that sometime after, that you have purchased your ticket......these bingo sessions sell out fast....
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles39@comcast.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: FOXWOODS BINGO NOV 10 10:30 AM
